title: Consolidate Dashboard Widget System Architecture
description: Analyze and merge the 8+ existing dashboard implementations into a single, cohesive system that provides the foundation for widget customization features. acceptance: 1) Select primary implementation based on completeness and maintainability 2) Migrate best features from secondary implementations (widget placement algorithms, storage backends, validation schemas) 3) Create unified API surface for all dashboard operations 4) Ensure Zod schema validation throughout 5) Maintain existing functionality while simplifying the codebase 6) Update all import paths to use the consolidated system
